name: Shp Space
description: Collect the broken pieces, Bring them together.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit) Processor: 2.0 GHz - Dual core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 25 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.5 GHz - Triple core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 30 MB available space
